emptyTocMessage.message: Sobald die Konversation beginnt, wird das Verzeichnis hier aufgezeichnet.
emptyTocMessage.description: Nachricht, die angezeigt wird, wenn das Inhaltsverzeichnis leer ist.

attachmentLabel.description: Label for a user message that contains only an attachment and no text.

clickToPin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is not pinned.

unpin.description: Tooltip for the entry icon when the outline is pinned.

askGemini.description: Button text for the quick quote feature.

regardingThis.description: Hidden text prepended to the user's input when using the quick quote feature.

enableQuickQuoteLabel.description: Label for the toggle switch in the popup.

reportIssueLabel.description: Label for the feedback link in the popup.

enableChatOutlineLabel.description: Label for the toggle switch in the popup for the chat outline feature.
